items.sentence: I would've expected Tom to behave more politely.
Tom is better at explaining things than Mary is.
Do you feel the same way about that as Tom does?
I wish things were the way that they used to be.
I wish that things were the way they used to be.
I thought you said you weren't afraid of ghosts.
You realize that Tom lives in Boston now, right?
You can find better things to do with your time.
We'd probably be mistreated if we were captured.
Tom is almost as good a chess player as Mary is.
